mapper.select: SELECT FROM erp_transfer_order_material_bulk etomb WHERE etomb.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND etomb.data_status = 1

SELECT count(etomb.id) FROM erp_transfer_order_material_bulk etomb
AND etomb.data_status = 1

SELECT FROM erp_transfer_order_material_bulk etomb WHERE etomb.transfer_order_id = #{transferOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND etomb.transfer_order_material_id = #{transferOrderMaterialId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND etomb.data_status = 1
SELECT FROM erp_transfer_order_material_bulk etomb WHERE etomb.transfer_order_id = #{transferOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND etomb.data_status = 1

SELECT ,ebm.bulk_material_name AS bulk_material_name,ebm.current_warehouse_id AS current_warehouse_id, ebm.owner_warehouse_id AS owner_warehouse_id,ebm.bulk_material_status AS bulk_material_status,ebm.bulk_material_type AS bulk_material_type, ebm.material_capacity_value AS material_capacity_value,ebm.bulk_material_price AS bulk_material_price,ebm.material_no AS material_no, ew1.warehouse_name AS current_warehouse_name,ew2.warehouse_name AS owner_warehouse_name,eb.brand_name AS brand_name FROM ( SELECT FROM erp_transfer_order_material_bulk etomb
and etomb.transfer_order_material_id = #{maps.transferOrderMaterialBulkQueryParam.transferOrderMaterialId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and etomb.data_status = 1
order by etomb.create_time desc LIMIT #{maps.start},#{maps.pageSize} ) etomb left join erp_bulk_material ebm ON ebm.bulk_material_no = etomb.bulk_material_no and ebm.data_status = 1 left join erp_brand eb ON eb.id = ebm.brand_id AND eb.data_status =1 left join erp_warehouse ew1 ON ew1.id = ebm.current_warehouse_id AND ew1.data_status =1 left join erp_warehouse ew2 ON ew2.id = ebm.owner_warehouse_id AND ew2.data_status =1 order by etomb.create_time desc
